doc.title: Midnight Conflict
doc.plot: In the dark of midnight, A young CIA Operative code-named Condor must fight to complete the most challenging mission of his career. The story begins when Condor receives a highly classified document that contains schematics for a new military prototype. His orders are clear: attempt to deliver the document at his scheduled rendezvous. However, the agency fears that security was breached and believes that an unknown terrorist group may know the location and time of this rendezvous. Condor is advised to proceed with caution. While the contents of the package are unknown to him, it is clear to Condor that he must protect the documents at all costs. The rendezvous turns out to be a trap Condor is ambushed by several unknown assailants who are after the document. Now, Condor must stop at nothing to keep the document safe.
